alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Mitchell, Jewell and eastern Osborne Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking spotty thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hardy to 7 miles west of Hunter. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...These thunderstorms despite being fairly weak could bring down some stronger winds from aloft resulting in wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and perhaps even close to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Downs, Mankato, Cawker City, Glen Elder, Jewell, Tipton, Burr Oak, Formoso, Ionia, Randall, Hunter, Webber, Scottsville, Victor, Lovewell State Park and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
